alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:56PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Laramie County through 230 PM MDT... At 155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Federal to 6 miles northwest of North Cheyenne. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitaker and Ranchettes. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 21 and 31. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
